rules.name: quick
rules.description: Type the prompt as quickly as you can!

rules.name: no spaces
rules.description: Remove all spaces from the prompt!

rules.name: replace a's with e's
rules.description: Replace every instance of an 'a' with an 'e'!

rules.name: replace i's with o's
rules.description: Replace every instance of an 'i' with an 'o'!

rules.name: replace s's with z's
rules.description: Replace every instance of an 's' with an 'z'!

rules.name: double
rules.description: Double every character that you see!

rules.name: reverse
rules.description: Type The Reverse of Your Prompt!

rules.name: remove punctuation
rules.description: Remove All Punctuations Marks From the Prompt!

rules.name: remove first letter
rules.description: Remove The First Letter of Every Word in the Prompt!

rules.name: remove last letter
rules.description: Remove The Last Letter of Every Word in the Prompt!
